## IntRange.contains() method

Test if a value is within this range, inclusive.

**Signature:**

```typescript
contains(value: number): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | number | the value to test (<code>null</code> represents infinity) |

**Returns:**

boolean

`true` if `min <= value <= max`
